title: Lea L'hiver = Lea, in Winter
description: On a Spanish island, a young French woman has died after falling from a cliff. The local police inspector is asked to solve the case quickly and quietly, so as not to disturb tourism. As the investigation seeks to find out whether this was an accidental death, a murder or a suicide, the inspector is forced to look into the long list of the victim's lovers.  Credits: Producers, Jacques Rouffio, Francis Girod ; director, Marc Monnet ; writer, Marc Monnet ; photography, Claude Beausoleil ; music, Olivier Bloch-Laine. Cast: Karen Blanguernon, Gilles Segal, Monique Melinand, Jean-Claude Bouillon, Hente Sonderland, Jacques Higelin, Louis Daquin.
